metadata.title: CVE-2016-10206 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Zoneminder 1.30 and earlier allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of users for requests that change passwords and possibly have unspecified other impact as demonstrated by a crafted user action request to index.php.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-10206` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.30.4+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.30.4+dfsg-1').
